alert.note: Alert for Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:42AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Medina County through 430 AM CDT... At 342 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mico, or 13 miles south of Bandera, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hondo, Devine, Castroville, Lytle, Natalia, Noonan, New Fountain, Quihi, Dunlay, Mico, Biry, Pearson, Yancey, Rio Medina, Bader, and Hill Country State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
